doc.field: Albany County and Rensselaer County Courts records
Albany County and Rensselaer County Courts records

Various records of the Albany and Rensselaer County Courts, including an affidavit from John Seelye (Albany County), a petition of Jacob Miller (Albany County), and an affidavit from David Bryan (Rensselaer County). Records date from 1793 and 1811.

Various records of the Albany and Rensselaer County Courts, including an affidavit from John Seelye (Albany County), a petition of Jacob Miller (Albany County), and an affidavit from David Bryan (Rensselaer County). Records date from 1793 and 1811.

Various records of the Albany and Rensselaer County Courts, including an affidavit from John Seelye (Albany County), a petition of Jacob Miller (Albany County), and an affidavit from David Bryan (Rensselaer County). Records date from 1793 and 1811.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
